name: Trans Coming Out Simulator 2018
description:
Trans Coming Out Simulator 2018, was inspired by the Nicky Case's "Coming Out Simulator 2014". This game includes stories about transmen and transwomen. Thinking in our shoes, be aware of how we might feel and carefully choose your words.

This game discusses hate speech against transgender. Be careful this might trigger you or if you are sensitive to this topic. Also, keep in mind that the game is only about person's own experience.

. . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .

Original game : Coming Out Simulator 2014
Created by :  Raul | @R__aulT
Official trailer : Youtube
Scenario : Raul(FTM) & D-D(MTF)
English translation : CODE
Korean : https://seongwoonr.github.io/trans-coming-out-simulator-2018/
The Source Code : on github
If it's hard for mobile, how about trying here? https://seongwoonr.github.io/tcos2018/

. . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .

If you have any questions or suggestions, or... want to report incorrect context, bugs, etc.
Please let me know!
The contact is in my github page
